headline: Seat on a Rocket Ship!
pros:
I have recently completed 7 months in Pine Labs and loved my tenure so far. I am surrounded by some of the smartest Product & Fintech minds of India and that has helped me grow as a person. 

Pine Labs has an excellent culture. Having the right culture-fit has always been super critical for me and I am incredibly happy with the way Pine Labs is built. PL rewards you for your work, provides you with recognition and thanks to a tradition of constant feedback loops, you grow with the organization.

Pine Labs also provides you with all the right tools to unblock you. This can be in the form of quick access to paid software products (Asana, JIRA, Balsamiq, Figma, and so on), quick travel arrangements (if needed), and more. 

The company has an atmosphere of openness. Everyone from your L1 and L2 managers, to the HR, to the company's top leadership are always open to your thoughts, ideas and feedback.
cons: Nothing in particular. I believe every company faced friction as WFH was implemented due to the current pandemic but as we slowly move towards a new normal, that minor friction will end too.
